name: Faro (wildiant)
description:
Survive a series of platforming trials, avoid getting hit by enemies and use your grappling hook to approach far to reach places.

controls(if not using PS controller):

WASD: move

space: jump

held click + move: grapple aim 

This game was part of a 3 week school project focused on developing a platformer level using the Unity Game Engine . 

Roles: programming. UI, level design.
